elements.title: Jamie Proctor (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Jamie Proctor won Port Vale's Goal of the Season award after scoring a scissor-kick volley (pictured) against Sutton United?

elements.title: 7/11 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the video for "7/11" by Beyoncé contains a cameo from her daughter Blue Ivy?

elements.title: Elise Reiman (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Elise Reiman, who taught children's classes at George Balanchine's School of American Ballet for four decades, was called "the bridge between generations"?

elements.title: crashed in 1972 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a Turkish Airlines aircraft that crashed in 1972 had been due to carry Turkish prime minister Nihat Erim later that day?

elements.title: Hamim Tohari (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Hamim Tohari, the current spokesperson of the Indonesian Army, was once removed from his post after being caught using a phone during a meeting with the commander-in-chief?

elements.title: TreasuryDirect (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that TreasuryDirect, a website for purchasing US Treasury securities, originated in 1986 as a computerized service conducted over postal mail?

elements.title: Reptilia (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the manga series Reptilia was inspired in part by a story from Japanese folklore about a woman who is transformed into a snake, told to author Kazuo Umezu as a child?

elements.title: out of her bath (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Nancy Reagan jumped out of her bath when she heard that her husband had been elected President of the United States?
